title: Margot Under the Mistletoe
description: Margot Peters is back home from college to celebrate Christmas the best way she can: working her small town’s famed Christmas market. And this year, she is determined to help her mom win the Christmas Cup. With their perfect holiday waffle booth, what could go wrong?A certain man named Nicolaus Ostergard, that’s what. He helps his dad run Margot’s biggest competition: Ostergard Ornaments, a booth filled with annoyingly intricate handmade ornaments. Nicolaus will stop at nothing to distract Margot from her waffle-selling duties. As the days inch closer to Christmas, Margot will have to decide if the enemy is really what he seems, or if maybe, just maybe, she’s had a soft spot for him all along . . .
author: Kiera Jones
